name: kandl
description: WordPress Theme for Kyle and Laura's Wedding.

scripts.build: npm run js:build && npm run css:build
scripts.css:build: npm run css:compile && npm run css:autoprefix
scripts.dev: npm run watch | npm run browsersync
scripts.js:build: npm run js:head && npm run js:main
scripts.js:head: uglifyjs js/head/*.js -o js/head.min.js
scripts.js:watch: watch 'npm run js:build' js/head js/vendor js/src
scripts.watch: npm run js | npm run css

author: Kyle Brumm
